description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows Mark of the Web security feature bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-43487):

1. Download and apply the appropriate KB5043064 or KB5043083 update from the official Microsoft Update catalog.
2. Follow the installation prompts and restart your system to ensure the updates take effect.

**Details**:
- This update addresses the security feature bypass vulnerability which may allow unauthorized access.
- Ensure your system is running one of the affected Windows 10 builds: 10.0.19044.4894 or 10.0.19045.4894.
- For manual installation, download the update package from:
  - https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043083
  - https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043064.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure the system is updated to the mentioned build numbers.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation.
